incident_updates.body: Update : Since 28/04/2025 16:40 UTC the Pop in Madrid is unreachable. Service impact : At 28/04/2025 15:08 UTC lost of the PoP in Madrid. At 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC the Pop was available again. At 28/04/2025 16:40 UTC lost of the Pop in Madrid. From 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC, there is multiple peering down at Madrid, leading to re-routing traffic for the following providers : AIRENET - ESPAIX - TELXIUS - ALTICE

An incident has occures on our Network in PAR/MAD due to the Regional Power Outage affecting Spain & Portugal, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details: Start time : 28/04/2025 15:08 UTC End time : 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC Service impact : At 28/04/2025 15:08 UTC lost of the PoP in Madrid. At 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC the Pop is available again. From 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC, there is multiple peering down at Madrid, leading to re-routing traffic for the following providers : AIRENET - ESPAIX - TELXIUS - ALTICE Root cause : The incident is due to the Regional Power Outage affecting Spain & Portugal Ongoing actions : The pop in Madrid is available again. We are waiting for final confirmation from our providers. The situation is under control again. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure. Start time : 28/04/2025 19:30 UTC End time : 29/04/2025 04:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance, customers will face latency increase to access their services passing from LIL1 and AMS. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Backbone offer. This may temporarily affect Latency. Start time : 29/04/2025 05:00 UTC End time : 29/04/2025 07:00 UTC Service impact : Latencies for customer configuration requests will be observed during the operation. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Infrastructure offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 29/04/2025 05:00 UTC End time : 29/04/2025 06:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in rack 46E18 will be temporarily unavailable during the operation. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on an electrical equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 29/04/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 29/04/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : None. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Network offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 29/04/2025 20:00 UTC End time : 29/04/2025 22:00 UTC Service impact : Public and vRack network will be temporarily unavailable for some customers during the operation in this rack G137A11. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 01/05/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 01/05/2025 18:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 12 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Public Network service. Start time : 02/05/2025 00:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2025 03:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Public Network service . Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 05/05/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 08/05/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing a preventive cooling maintenance in LIM1. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 12/05/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 12/05/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Roubaix site on May 12, 2025. Start time : 12/05/2025 20:00 UTC End time : 13/05/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network core infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment. This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below : Step 1 : Preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours) Step 2 : Deployment of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours) Step 3 : Testing and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours) We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Roubaix site on May 14, 2025. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network core infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 29/05/2025 11:00 UTC End time : 29/05/2025 20:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 20 minutes. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance. The operation is carried out in several steps: Step 1 : From 11:00 UTC to 11:30 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers Step 2 : From 11:30 UTC to 19:30 UTC Step 3 : From 19:30 UTC to 20:00 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are T04A, T04B and T04C Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS6 are T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are B702, B703, B707 and B709 Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.
